Package model

Class Booking

Object
model.Booking
public class Booking
extends Object
Booking represents a booking made by a Consumer for a TicketedEvent EventPerformance.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Booking​(long bookingNumber, Consumer booker, EventPerformance performance, int numTickets, double amountPaid, LocalDateTime bookingDateTime)  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void cancelByConsumer()
    Sets the status to BookingStatus.CancelledByConsumer.
    void cancelByProvider()
    Sets the status to BookingStatus.CancelledByProvider.
    void cancelPaymentFailed()
    Sets the status to BookingStatus.PaymentFailed.
    double getAmountPaid()  
    Consumer getBooker()  
    long getBookingNumber()  
    EventPerformance getEventPerformance()  
    BookingStatus getStatus()  
    String toString()

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Booking

      public Booking​(long bookingNumber, Consumer booker, EventPerformance performance, int numTickets, double amountPaid, LocalDateTime bookingDateTime)
      Parameters:
      bookingNumber - unique identifier for this booking
      booker - the Consumer who made this booking
      performance - the EventPerformance this booking is for
      numTickets - the number of booked tickets
      amountPaid - the amount paid (needed in case of a refund)
      bookingDateTime - the date and time when this booking was made
